content:
Yesterday Kate was off her pills and feeling a bit sickly. I wanted to get a lot of chores done quickly. Decided to take an old school approach and rule with an iron fist. It worked great. Chloe cried a lot but JJ got stuck in and shit got done. I'm finding more and more respect for the old ways as I get older. I don't think I would use it but maybe the smacking ban was a mistake..
(I still plan to vote Greens)
